verses.text:
There is no love like the love of Jesus,
Never to fade or fall,
Till into the fold of the peace of God,
He has gathered us all.

There is no eye like the eye of Jesus,
Piercing so deep and true,
Oh, there is none in the voice of Jesus,
So tender and sweet to you.

chorus.text:
O love of God, how rich and pure!
How measureless and strong!
It shall for evermore endure,
Jesus' love, precious love, Boundless and pure and free!
